welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Quezaltepeque, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and friendly locals. Get ready to immerse yourself in our beautiful streets, taste our delicious cuisine, and discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ilopango International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ilopango International Airport handles all cargo shipments and operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Salvador International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at El Salvador International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport.
